paper_abstract: Conditions for bimodality of mixtures of two unimodal distributions axe investigated in some special cases. Based on general characterizations, explicit criteria for the parameters axe derived for mixtures of two Cauchy, logistic, Student, gamma, log-normal, Gumbel and other distributions.
paper_title: CONDITIONS FOR BIMODALITY AND MULTIMODALITY OF A MIXTURE OF TWO UNIMODAL DENSITIES
